spamclustering.algorithms package¶

Submodules¶

spamclustering.algorithms.clusteringalgorithm module¶

class spamclustering.algorithms.clusteringalgorithm.ClusteringAlgorithm(input_list, output_path)¶

Bases: object

Base class for clustering algorithms.

Implements some boiler plate code for writing clusters to disk.

do_clustering()¶

Performs the class specific clustering algorithm.

The base class creates one cluster and adds all items to this cluster. This function is to be overwritten by classes which inherited from ClusteringAlgorithm and implement own clustering algorithms.

write_cluster_to_disk()¶

Writes all clusters in cluster_dict to disk.

Path is specified through self.output_path, which was set when calling the respective constructor. Needs to be set otherwise.

spamclustering.algorithms.ctph module¶

class spamclustering.algorithms.ctph.Ctph(input_list, output_path, threshold=85)¶

Bases: ClusteringAlgorithm

Implements context triggered piecewise hash algorithm.

The actual hashing and compare algorithms are provided by the library ssdeep, developed by Jesse Kornblum. This c library is used with python bindings which can be installed pypi ssdeep package. If the similarity score of two hash values are greater than a threshold value, they will potentially grouped in one cluster. An email is only added to the cluster containing the mail with the greatest similarity score.

Parameters:

  • input_list (str or list of str) – List of file names to process.

  • output_path (str) – Path to the location to which all cluster should be written to.

  • threshold_value (int or float) – Threshold of matching score. If matching score is greater, the files are considered a match.

do_clustering()¶

Concrete implementation specific to the algorithm.

For further details on the algorithm, read the class doc string.

spamclustering.algorithms.spamcluster module¶

class spamclustering.algorithms.spamcluster.SpamCluster(path)¶

Bases: object

Helper class which stores cluster information.

Parameters:

  • uuid (uuid.uuid) – UUID of this spamclustering.algorithms.ctph.Spamcluster.

  • path (str) – Path to where this cluster is to be written to.

  • cluster_members (list of str) – List of filenames representing files added to this cluster

add(files)¶

Add files to the cluster. This function will append the given file(s) to the cluster’s file list.

Parameters:

files (str, list of str) – List of file names to add to this cluster, or a string for a single file.

write_to_path()¶

Write this cluster to the desired path.

The destination path was stated when calling the constructor. Within this path, a directory will be created with the UUID of this cluster as name. All files belonging to this cluster will either be copied or respective symbolic links will created.
